tool.name: TFBS counts in promoters
tool.description: get counts of binding sites for each TF proximal to each gene
tool.command: gettfbscounts_wrapper.py --out-dir $output.extra_files_path --output $output --genome $genomedb --tissue $projectdb #if str($genelist) != "None": --genelist $genelist #end if #if str($tflist) != "None": --tflist $tflist #end if ##--biotype $biotype ##--moltype $moleculetype #if $checkGeneID: --geneID T #else: --geneID F #end if --upstreamsize $upstream --downstreamsize $downstream

param.name: genelist
param.label: List of genes
param.help: If no gene list provided, by default it will use all available genes in a model database.

param.name: tflist
param.label: List of Transcription Factors (TFs)
param.help: If no TF list provided, by default it will use all available TFs in a model database.

param.label: Use Gene IDs
param.name: checkGeneID
param.help: If checked, the gene and TF inputs are expected as Ensembl IDs (i.e. ENSG). Otherwise, gene symbols are expected.

param.label: Upstream Search Window Size from TSS
param.name: upstream

param.label: Downstream Search Window Size from TSS
param.name: downstream
